reviewText:
I just had to say something... since there were no reviews-
Not only was this 'film' light on content, it's only 13 minutes long !  The credits are about 3 minutes long after that, including a few lame comments too for filler-
I don't know how to sail, so was looking for some interesting overall information-  If that's you, look elsewhere too-  The few things they are able to go over in the few minutes of length, are things that anyone with the most passing, and minimal of interest would know-
Don't waste your (13 minutes of) time and money !
